title: Champion Creation: Emily the Eccentric Engineer
body:
**Emily the Eccentric Engineer**

**Background:**
>Emily was born in a small village on the outskirts of Ionia. Her parents were kind people that often let homeless or unfortunate people rest in the house, whilst teaching them skills they could use to earn a living. Emily was no different and spent most of her time inventing contraptions that could better people’s lives. When Noxus invaded, her farther was conscripted to the army and died in battle. Her mother later fell ill and so Emily travelled to the Shojin Temple looking for someone who could help. There she saw a man on fire, she rushed to help but was told he was protesting the occupation of Ionia, which later led to the end of the war. 

>She saw this man as a hero, someone brave enough to sacrifice himself for the people. Upon hearing he had left to join the League of Legends, she vowed to hone her skills so she could help heroes like him.


**Statistics:**
>Health: 550 ~ 2000
HP regen: 5.5 ~ 15
Mana: 350 ~ 1000
Mana regen: 8 ~ 18
Range: 125
Attack damage: 55 ~ 100
Attack speed: .644 (+ 0 ~ 55%)
Armour: 20 ~ 100
Magic Resist: 30 ~ 50 
Move speed: 335


**Passive: Hit it ‘til it breaks**
>Every 3rd hit on towers, minions and monsters triggers an effect. 
1.	Minions - If an ally is within 700 range, the minion is instantly killed and the gold is given to the ally. (Cooldown: 10 seconds)
2.	Towers -  The tower is disabled for 3 seconds. (Cooldown: 180 seconds)
3.	Large monsters – The monster is stunned for 2 seconds (Cooldown: 10 second)
4.	Epic monsters – The monster is weakened, taking 20% increase damage from allies for 5 seconds. (Cooldown 15 seconds)


**Q: Flash BANG!!**
>Cooldown: 18/16/14/12/10 seconds (Starts after cast)
Range: 1500
Mana cost: 55/60/65/70/75

>Emily channels for up to 4 seconds, increasing the stun duration, damage, area of effect and delay of the ignition. 
Stun: .5 seconds – 2.5 seconds
Damage: 10/15/20/25/30 – 30/45/60/75/90 (+50%AP)
Area of effect: 50 range – 500 range
Delay: Instant – 2 seconds


**W: Healing thingy.**
>Cooldown: 28 seconds
Range: 50
Mana cost: 110
Duration: 140 seconds

>Emily places a healing station at a target location that increases the health regen of allies inside by 50 + 1/2/3/4/5% (+1% per 100AP) Max hp + 15% Missing hp per 5 seconds. 
[The health station can be destroyed by enemies]
Stations health: 3/3/4/4/5
Reward of killing: 30 gold

 >Only 1 can be placed out at a time. Grants vision for 3 seconds after being placed. 

**E: Tampering is fun.**
>Cooldown: 10 seconds
Range: 100
Mana cost: 80/85/90/95/100
>*   If used on self or ally, basic attacks deal 20/25/30/35/40 bonus magic damage for 6 seconds. It also increases armour (10/15/20/25/30) (+5 per 100AP) and magic resistance (5/10/15/20/25) (+5 per 100AP). Values are halved if used on self.
*  If used on allied tower, increases the towers attack speed by 20/30/40/50/60% for 5 seconds.
*  If used on enemy champion, grounds and slows for 40/50/60/70/80% decaying over 2.5 seconds. 
*  If used on enemy tower, ally’s basic attacks deal an additional 5/10/15/20/25 true damage for 5 seconds. 

**R: My best Invention yet!**
>Cooldown: 120/100/80 Seconds
Range: 800 (for cast)/400 (for explosion)
Mana cost: 130/110/90

>A suit of armour flies out of Emily’s backpack attaching itself to the target shielding (150/300/450) (+50%AP) and reducing damage taken by 10% for 3 seconds before exploding, dealing 30% of damage dealt in that time and knocking back enemies.

replies.body: Does anyone have any suggestions or feedback?
